title: Will the Great Barrier Reef cure Claude Clough
creator_credit: John Milson, Richard Mason and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A travel film with a difference. Claude Clough, frustrated and depressed, consults a psychiatrist who prescribes a holiday on the Great Barrier Reef. Underwater photography shows some of the dazzling coral formations and reefs and the striking scenery of the reef islands. A satirical fantasy on the theme of a holiday on the Great Barrier Reef.
